**Phases:** حلم → رؤية → تجهيز → تنفيذ → تطوير → توسع

| Phase | Focus | Notes |
|---|---|---|
| تجهيز | Governance, design, team | Project & operations teams |
| تنفيذ | Build, operate, maintain | Commission key assets |
| تطوير وتوسع | Improve & scale | Replicate to new cities |

#### 400–40–4 (from presentation)
- 400: Long-horizon, national industrial learning agenda
- 40: Priority industrial projects/clusters
- 4: Initial anchor RSIC sites
